params._token0: token to be converted to sdex
params._token1: token to be converted to sdex

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._amount0Delta: amount of token0 for the swap (negative is incoming, positive is required to pay to pair)
params._amount1Delta: amount of token1 for the swap (negative is incoming, positive is required to pay to pair)
params._data: for Router path and payer for the swap (see router for details)

params._amountOutMin: The minimum SDEX amount required to prevent the transaction from reverting
params._amountToSwap: amount of tokens from _path[0] to be converted into SDEX
params._deadline: Unix timestamp after which the transaction will revert
params._path: An array of token addresses. path.length must be >= 2. Pools for each consecutive pair of addresses must exist and have liquidity. Last token must be SDEX

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

workExecuted(address,uint256,address,uin.notice: emitted every time the AutoSwapper swaps and stacks SDEXs

executeWork(address,address).notice: public function for executing swaps on tokens and burn, will be called from a Smardex Pair on mint and burn, and can be forced call by anyone

swapTokenWithPath(uint256,uint256,addres.notice: onlyOwner function to swap token in SDEX and send it to the staking address (or burn on L2)

transferTokens().notice: transfer SDEX from here to address dead

userdoc.notice: AutoSwapper makes it automatic and/or public to get fees from Smardex and burn it
